original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1071)@</color>在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4645)@</color> 秒內讓自身即使體力見底也不會死亡，並提升我方全體武將 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4645)@</color> 點武力以及智力，同時提升我方全體士兵 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4650)@</color> 點武力。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1071)@</color> within <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4645)@</color> seconds Let yourself not die even if your physical strength is bottomed out, and improve all our generals <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4645)@</color> a little bit of force and intelligence, and at the same time improve all our soldiers <color=#ccffcc> $Status_Str(4650)@</color> Take force.
